benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: GET /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId} - Retrieve an account by id

covered: Valid Request coverage: The tests cover default and parameterized account retrieval with 200 responses (TC01–TC06, TC30–TC33).

Query Parameter coverage: Comprehensive coverage of accountWithBalance, accountWithBalanceAndCBA, and audit parameter across FULL/MINIMAL and combinations (TC02, TC03, TC04, TC05, TC06, TC23, TC24, TC25, TC27–TC33).
Authorization coverage: Tests include missing authentication (TC10) and invalid token (TC11) leading to 401, with valid authentication in other scenarios.

Error Handling coverage: 404 not found for missing/non-existent accounts (TC07, TC08), 400 for invalid accountId or bad parameter values (TC09, TC23, TC25), 503 for service unavailability (TC12), and timeout scenarios (TC16).
Security coverage: SQL injection (TC13) and XSS (TC14) in accountId to verify input sanitization and no leakage of sensitive data.
Resilience & robustness: Timeout (TC16), large payload (TC17), concurrency (TC18), degraded dependency behavior (TC20), and recovery from transient network failure (TC26).
Compatibility & accessibility: Backward compatibility (TC19) and API documentation/UI accessibility (TC21).
Regression coverage: Regression test for previously fixed issue (TC22).
Boolean parameter coverage: Extensive testing of boolean combinations and edge cases (TC23, TC27–TC33).
gaps: Pagination: No pagination tests for large result sets or multi-page responses.
Caching Behavior: No tests validating HTTP caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control).
Rate Limiting: No tests for throttling or 429 responses under load.
Internal Server Error: No explicit 500 Internal Server Error scenario (only 503 in TC12).
Authorization scope: No test for 403 Forbidden due to insufficient permissions.
Empty response body: No explicit test for truly empty response bodies (beyond 404 not found).
recommendations: Add pagination tests for large datasets to verify paging behavior and navigation.
Add caching tests to verify ETag/Cache-Control headers and caching semantics.
Add rate-limiting tests to verify throttling or 429 responses under load.
Add explicit 500 Internal Server Error test cases to validate server-side error handling.
Add 403 Forbidden tests to cover permission-related access control scenarios.
Consider adding tests for truly empty (204) responses if that is part of the design, and refine expectations for empty bodies.
Review and optimize boolean parameter tests (TC27–TC33) to ensure coverage without duplication.
